https://tmrev.io/movie/270855-Cairo Exit 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/p3mCSt7A5jc6BWAmK2yAB1875IJ.jpg A powerful account of life in contemporary Cairo, this raw drama about a pair of star-crossed lovers shines a powerful spotlight upon the social and cultural taboos that riddle the city's diverse population. Heralding a bold new shift for contemporary Egyptian cinema, 'Cairo Exit' is a gritty and uncompromising work from a major new cinematic talent, Hesham Issawi. Cairo Exit
